lead_paragraph: CHERMAYEFF--Sara Anne Duffy, born 1934 in Baltimore, MD. Died March 16, 2016. Sara died peacefully at home of natural causes with her family at her side. She was the daughter of three time Pulitzer Prize winning political cartoonist for The Baltimore Sun, Edmund Duffy and artist, designer, entrepreneur Anne Rector Duffy, and Goddaughter of H.L. Mencken. Sara was married to Ivan Chermayeff from 1955 to 1977. She is survived by their daughters, Catherine, Sasha and Maro Chermayeff and her grandchildren, Loulou, and Fanny David, Phineas and Olivia Howie and Su Huai Chermayeff. Sara was a graduate of Sarah Lawrence Collage and a creative and vibrant individual whose talents included painting, writing and cooking. She was known by all her friends as a brilliant and humorous conversationalist. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CHERMAYEFF, SARA ANNE DUFFY
